Properties.Name: API Key
Properties.Help: API Key from https://developer.riotgames.com/ (requires you to setup a personal App)

Properties.Name: Region
Properties.Help: Region type from https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/lol 'Platform Routing Values' eg 'NA1' or 'EUW1'

Properties.Name: SummonerName
Properties.Help: The League Of Legends Summoner Name to monitor
